Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Percent of CPU time spent in idle state in past cycle.
Columns.Name: CpuIdle

Columns.Description: Percent of CPU time spent running processes with positive nice values.
Columns.Name: CpuNice

Columns.Description: Number of CPU cores running on the node.
Columns.Name: NumberOfCpu

Columns.Description: Percent of CPU time spent running system level processes in past cycle.
Columns.Name: CpuSystem

Columns.Description: Percent of CPU time spent running user level processes in past cycle.
Columns.Name: CpuUser

Columns.Description: Percent of CPU time spent waiting for I/O requests in past cycle.
Columns.Name: CpuIOWait

Columns.Description: Amount of free disk space (in GB).
Columns.Name: DiskFree

Columns.Description: Total disk space (in GB).
Columns.Name: DiskTotal

Columns.Description: Number of bytes read.
Columns.Name: ReadBytes

Columns.Description: Number of read operations.
Columns.Name: ReadCount

Columns.Description: Time spent on read operations.
Columns.Name: ReadTime

Columns.Description: Number of bytes written.
Columns.Name: WriteBytes

Columns.Description: Number of write operations.
Columns.Name: WriteCount

Columns.Description: Time spent on write operations.
Columns.Name: WriteTime

Columns.Description: load over past 15 minutes.
Columns.Name: FifteenMinutLoad

Columns.Description: load over past five minutes.
Columns.Name: FiveMinuteLoad

Columns.Description: load over past one minute.
Columns.Name: OneMinuteLoad

Columns.Description: amount of cached memory in KB.
Columns.Name: CachedMemory

Columns.Description: amount of free memory in KB.
Columns.Name: FreeMemory

Columns.Description: amount of sharedmemory in KB.
Columns.Name: SharedMemory

Columns.Description: total amount of memory in KB.
Columns.Name: TotalMemory

Columns.Description: amount of free swap memory in KB.
Columns.Name: FreeSwapMemory

Columns.Description: Bytes ingested in last timeframe.
Columns.Name: BytesIn

Columns.Description: Bytes sent out.
Columns.Name: BytesOut

Columns.Description: Packets ingest in last timeframe.
Columns.Name: PacketsIn

Columns.Description: Packets sent out in last timeframe.
Columns.Name: PacketsOut

Columns.Description: Processes run in last timeframe.
Columns.Name: ProcessesRun

Columns.Description: Total amount of processes run on host.
Columns.Name: TotalProcesses

Columns.Description: Name of the cluster the host belongs to.
Columns.Name: ClusterName

Columns.Description: Name of the host the record came from.
Columns.Name: HostName

Columns.Description: Type of cluster the record came from.
Columns.Name: ClusterType

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
